## <ApiType type="Class" path="responses/base_response/BaseResponse" symbolName="BaseResponse" /> BaseResponse

## <ApiType type="Function" path="responses/base_response/BaseResponse" symbolName="format" /> format

Format the response according to the response format parser.

This method is only available if the call was created with a T.
It will parse the response content according to the specified format and return
a structured object.

  parameters={[
